Data.value: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts to access your account. Your account will be automatically locked for 1 hour for security measures before you can re-enter your details. If you have any concerns about your account, please call our Customer Services team on 0800 591 688* or 0330 123 1688**.
* Free from BT landlines. Other providers vary. Calls may be recorded.
** Charged at local rate from mobiles and private telephones.
The details you have entered do not match an active Clubcard for this account. Please try again
Please enter the digits requested below from your active Clubcard linked to this account (Clubcard, Clubcard Credit Card, Privilege Card or Clubcard Plus)
If you only need to order a replacement card or key fob, no need to complete the security verification, just
We take the safety of your security details seriously. So, to increase your online security when accessing your account, we will ask you for card verification.
If you have any concerns about the information that you are asked to provide for your account, please call our Customer Services team on 0800 591 688* or 0330 123 1688**
